text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Clack, rattle... Clack...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's snowing even harder... There's<n>normally a beautiful
view of the stars<n>here. I'm not sure how tonight will<n>turn
out though.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Whoa, look at all that snow. When did<n>it pile up so high?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It started coming down nearly thirty<n>minutes ago. You really
lose yourself<n>in that game of yours.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Cause you...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
...Nothin'. I was just thinking how the<n>snow's white as
your hair.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Oh, don't be silly. But never mind. If it<n>gets any worse, it'll
start snowing<n>down the whole mountain. And if that<n>
happens...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ticket won't be able to make it up<n>here, even if she's
feeling better.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Her safety won't be guaranteed... But<n>even if we say it's
dangerous, she'll<n>likely try to come anyway. What can I<n>
do...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hey, just forget Ticket for a while.<n>There's no use getting
upset over<n>stuff we can't control.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But Ticket—if she...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
She isn't struggling this hard just to<n>let a little snow stop
her. I'm sure she<n>already got better by screaming<n>
"Sickness is all in the mind!"

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: And I really don't wanna givethis present by myself...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, aren't you the one who said<n>she'd make a
miracle happen? Don't<n>chicken out in your beliefs now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ...I've got such wonderful friends.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? How so?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Both you and Ticket always show me<n>a completely different
perspective<n>than my own. Like just now with you,<n>Taishin.
Having you here is so<n>reassuring.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're never shy to tell me your<n>opinion, and you're
incredibly<n>considerate. Are you feeling bad that<n>I've been
preparing things all by<n>myself?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...Not really.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Then let me tell you what you<n>were about to say earlier.
" 'Cause<n>you won't let me help at all, so all I<n>can do is
play games."

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, you really are kind. But some<n>people would rather
please their<n>friends by taking care of them.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Put more explicitly, simply having youtwo be here is enough for me. So Imay have been overenthusiasticabout doing everything myself.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Hmph...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Shall we call Ticket? I'll tell her that<n>we're all ready here,
and to take her<n>time coming.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ...Like you know me, dummy.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rattle... Clack, clack...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Did you say something?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Me? No. It's just the wind outside.<n>The snow's getting
even heavier...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Fan B
text_block_list.text:
Ah, Oguri! Weren't you cold outside?<n>Just hold on a little.
We'll have some<n>piping hot food ready soon!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh, okay... Thank you! I can't wait.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I am excited, but... this isn't good.I just... I don't have a present!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't find any reindeer, and now<n>that I think about it, I
don't even have<n>a beard... Maybe I can't become<n>Santa
in time. I don't know...

text_block_list.name: Child Fan A
text_block_list.text: Huh? There's no star?!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: What's wrong? Did something<n>happen?

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Oh, er... It's about the star to decorate<n>our tree. The children
made it specially<n>for tonight, so we were taking great<n>care
in carrying it over, but...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
It's a blizzard out there right now.<n>And, well, it seems the
road up here<n>has been closed.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Meaning... we have no star...

text_block_list.name: Child Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Can't we do anything?! You'd really<n>like the star, Oguri! It's
amazing!

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... It's a terrible shame, but cars<n>can't make it up here
with the road<n>closed. We'll just have to wait until<n>
tomorrow for her to see the star.

text_block_list.name: Child Fan A
text_block_list.text:
But the star's for tonight's party. I<n>really thought it'd make
Oguri feel<n>better...

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Wh-whoa there, let's not mention<n>that.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Gee... Looks like our surprise fell<n>apart... I'm sorry. But I'm
sure once<n>the party begins, the kids will feel<n>better—

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'll go.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I'll go... and get the star.
